item.title: By: Andrew Lindsey
item.dc:creator: Andrew Lindsey
item.description: When OT saints addressed prayer to the LORD [i.e., YHWH], should we understand those prayers as addressed to the Father? [I ask this specifically thinking of NT texts where "LORD" passages are applied to the Son.]
item.content:encoded: When OT saints addressed prayer to the LORD [i.e., YHWH], should we understand those prayers as addressed to the Father? [I ask this specifically thinking of NT texts where “LORD” passages are applied to the Son.]

item.title: By: Andrew Lindsey
item.dc:creator: Andrew Lindsey
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Waldron,

Re: ” Of the Spirit it is affirmed that He proceedeth from the Father.'”

-And the Son(?)
